article_title: GOP About To Make A Government Shutdown Even More Likely

article_metadata.description: Why are Republican congressional leaders seriously considering trying to repeal Obamacare this September when (1) the effort is guaranteed to fail and (2) the debate will make a government shutdown this fall even more likely than the 60 percent I’ve previously estimated? As reported last week by Paul Krawzak in Roll [...]
article_metadata.author: Stan Collender
